page.title: 05SUN VALLEY. CLIFTON.
page.content: Also known as {J.B's AMUSEMENTS.} or J.B,s BINGO AND SOCIAL CLUB. The arcade area downstairs opens at 9am and closes at 10am, apart from Fridays and Saturdays (Clifton Market), when it opens at 7 30am for traders and early shoppers.On this floor are varieties of gambling and games machines plus a snack bar, providing hot meals throughout the day. The upstairs is more of a club room, with lounge bar serving alcoholic drinks during normal licensing hours,another hot-food snack bar and a bingo area.Bingo sessions are held every lunchtime with major cash prize sessions on Thursdays and Saturday afternoons.
